trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Independence
There were no other sightings in Independence on or around May 8th 2011
Summary: Bright Green object streaked through the sky
divs: sighting detailsnote: this call was taken by missouri mufon on 5\9\2011, and written in the caller's exact words. the caller is age 17. i was riding in the car with my mother late saturday night (sunday morning) near lee's summit road and 23rd street and looking out the window, when i saw a very bright green color object streak through the sky overhead. it had a long tail, and was headed from west to east. the tail dissappeared as fast at the object in front of it did. it looked like a round shape but i couldn't be sure because it moved so fast. it looked like it was lit up very brightly - kind of like a neon light. it was going very fast, and was out of sight quickly - within 3 seconds. i couldn't believe how fast it was moving! it would take an asprin to cover the oject up (with out the tail included). i like looking at the planets with my telescope at night, so i look at the sky a lot and see a lot of planes and helicopters in the sky, but i've never seen anything like this. i told my mom about it but by the time she looked it was gone. she said i could call you about it but not give my phone number. it sure didn't look like a plane. i don't think it was anything man-made and i don't think it was a meteor, either. a green meteor? i don't think so. i hope someone else saw this so my mom and dad won't think i'm crazy.
